{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=UniFi AP |revision=Pro |upc= |ean= |asin=B00HXT8T5O |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/17/2012 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=SWX-UAPRO |ic_id=6545A-UAPRO |us_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=560 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN25QH128 |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327;AR8327-BL1A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui=04:18:D6 |oui_eth=04:18:D6 }} [http://www.ubnt.com/unifi Product page]
